body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Ethan Mitchell and the customer's name is Olivia Turner.  The conversation is about Mels Cars (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Acme Corporation. My name is Alex. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, I need some help with my recent order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Sure, I'd be happy to help. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jane. Could you please provide me with your order number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. For verification purposes, can you please confirm your billing address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three Elm Street, Springfield.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Jane. I see your order here. It looks like it will be delivered by the end of the week.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Perfect, thank you so much for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Jane. Thank you for your time, and have a great day!
